titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon a late pamphlet, entituled, An answer to the Scots Presbyterian eloquence wherein the innocency of the Episcopal clergy is vindicated, and the constitution and government of our Church of Scotland defended, against the lies and calumnies of the Presbyterian pamphleters.
titleStmt.author: Strachan, William.
Ridpath, George, d. 1726. Answer to the Scots Presbyterian eloquence.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to William Strachan. cf. NUC pre-1956.
